pageContext.title: Migrating from Babel plugin to macros
pageContext.body:
Migrating from Babel plugin to macros¶

Replace plugins¶

  1. Remove LinguiJS plugins or presets:

    npm uninstall @lingui/babel-plugin-transform-js npm uninstall @lingui/babel-plugin-transform-react npm uninstall @lingui/babel-preset-js npm uninstall @lingui/babel-preset-react

  2. Install babel-plugin-macros:

    npm install –save-dev babel-plugin-macros

  3. Remove LinguiJS plugins/presets from babel config and add macros plugin:

    {
   "plugins": [
      "macros"
   ]
}

React¶

Migrating from React components to JSX macros is easy: just change imports from @lingui/react to @lingui/macro.
